scripts.dev: npm run contracts:build && tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.contracts:publish: npm run contracts:build && npm --prefix packages/contracts publish
scripts.build:verify: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const must=['dist/index.js','dist/features'];const missing=must.filter(p=>!fs.existsSync(path.resolve(p)));if(missing.length){console.error('Missing build outputs:', missing.join(', '));process.exit(1);}console.log('Build outputs present:', must.join(', '));"
